Contact us Privacy Policy for Stars Casino Train At Stars Casino Train, we understand the importance of privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our online casino platform, and provides information about your rights and choices in relation to this information. Information We Collect When you use our platform, we may collect the following types of information about you: Personal information, such as your name, email address, postal address, and phone number, that you provide to us when you register for an account, make a deposit, or request information from us. Financial information, such as your credit card number or bank account information, that you provide to us when you make a deposit. How We Use Your Information To provide and maintain our platform and services, including to process transactions and communicate with you about your account. To personalize your experience on our platform and to offer you relevant promotions and offers. To improve our platform and services, including by analyzing usage trends and conducting research and development. To comply with legal obligations, including to enforce our terms of service and to protect the rights and safety of our users and third parties. Sharing of Information We may share your information with the following third parties: Service providers, such as payment processors and hosting providers, who assist us in operating our platform and services. Regulatory authorities, including government agencies and law enforcement officials, in response to legal requests, or as otherwise required by law. Business partners, such as other online casinos or gaming operators, with whom we may collaborate on promotions or other offerings. Your Rights and Choices You have certain rights and choices in relation to your personal information, including: Access: You have the right to request access to your personal information and to receive information about the purposes for which we process it and the categories of third parties with whom we share it. Correction: You have the right to request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal information that we hold about you. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as necessary to provide you with our services. We may also retain and use your personal information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. If we make any material changes to our Privacy Policy, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our platform before the changes become effective. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for any use or activity that occurs under your account. By using our services, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age to participate in online gaming in your jurisdiction and that you are not prohibited from using our services under the laws of your jurisdiction. Prohibited Conduct You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited conduct: (a) using our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose; (b) using our services in violation of any applicable laws or regulations; (c) using our services in a manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks; (d) using our services in a manner that could interfere with any other user's use or enjoyment of our services; (e) using any robot, spider, scraper, data mining tools, data gathering and extraction tools, or other automated means to access our services for any purpose without our express written permission; (f) using any manual or automated means to circumvent any access controls or security measures on our services; (g) using our services to transmit any viruses, worms, defects, Trojan horses, or any other harmful code or components; (h) using our services to transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable; (i) impersonating any person or entity, including, but not limited to, a Stars Casino Train employee, or falsely stating or otherwise misrepresenting your affiliation with a person or entity; (j) manipulating the outcome of any game or contest; (k) colluding with other users in order to gain an unfair advantage; or (l) engaging in any other activity that Stars Casino Train determines, in its sole discretion, to be inappropriate or harmful to our services or to our users.
